description: This file is the main entry point of a Flutter application for a note-taking app called Notemaster. It sets up the main widget, initializes state management via Provider, and applies the app theme.

classes.name: NotesApp
classes.description: A stateless widget that serves as the root of the app, wrapping the MaterialApp with providers and theme configuration.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The app's entry point, which runs the NotesApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for NotesApp, setting up provider and theme for the application.
